creator: seth@prx.org
text:
...It would be nice if one could start with negative begin values...  e.g.
c:forEach begin="-180" end="180" var="deg" ...

creator: bayard@apache.org
text:
I've reported this to the 1.2 RI:

https://glassfish.dev.java.net/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=1741

We won't be fixing it unless the spec changes.
